tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi....visited orchid dental clinic (Uday Park) again along with my mother as she was facing issues with her tooth and their was some uneasyness in her jaw..I asked for Dr.Sonam as she was very kind & generous during our last visit in Oct 2020 when she treated my son with extreme caution and generosity..She performed required tooth X- ray of my mother  inorder to arrive at the issue/problem which was causing uneasyness..and suggested us that one teeth needs to be removed..since my mother is a senior citizen I was little apprehensive but considering last treatment I decided to go along with the her advice and we are happy that she performed the required treatment with extreme caution and we are indeed very happy with her procedure...Thanks Dr.Sonam for your treatment & advice.further it's really appreciable that your supporting staff is taking temperature record,checking spo2- levels and sanitizing everyone who is entering clinic...overall amazing high quality experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my 5 year old toddler for root canal. and I was actually worried how will this happen as it's a painful procedure.but Dr Sonam Duggal is such a wonderful, friendly,awsome, sweet, smooth in her professional things that my son didn even cry a bit . touchwood.. stil few more sittings are left and I am sure that will be great too.. 5 stars to the doc. she is capable of making a kid her friend.thankyou doc for making it a tension free visit for my son... I will recommend her to everyone I know.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback and such kind words üòä

review: Took my two small children to Dr. Sonam for their first dental checks. The doctor was very friendly, warm and put them completely at ease.  She was patient in answering All our questions. She was also very thorough with her exam *** *** *** ******* *** *********** ********** ** *********** A great first visit for the kids and their mom!
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words!:)

review: Dr. Sonam Duggal was very friendly and helpful. She carefully explained all the procedures and ensured I understood everything before proceeding. She was very professional and I faced no difficulties at all. The clinic was very hygienic and clean which is especially important during the pandemic. The dental chair and the area was also being sanitized after each use. Very comfortable visit.

I had visited Dr Sonam for the first time and I am very happy. *** **** *** ** * **** **** ****** *** also very gentle and considerate. She listened to my problem with patience and empathy which was very reassuring for me. All in all it was a very pleasant experience at her clinic. My compliments and best wishes to this young doctor.
Doctor was friendly and professional. Helped in identifying root cause and suggested with the most feasible solution.
